content: उच्चर् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go upwards, to rise; बाष्पमुच्चरति <ls>Mbh.</ls>; <ls>K. 14.</ls> {@--2@} To ascend (as the sun), issue or go forth, go up; <ls>Śi. 17. 52</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 21.</ls> {@--3@} To arise, appear forth, rise (as a voice), to be heard; उच्चचार निनदोंभसि तस्याः <ls>R. 9. 73</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 46</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 87</ls>; कोलाहलध्वनिरुदचरत् <ls>K. 27</ls>; <ls>U. 2</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To empty the body by evacuations, void one's excrement; तिरस्कृत्योच्चरेत्काष्ठलोष्टपत्रतृणादिना <ls>Ms. 4. 49.</ls> {@--5@} To emit (sounds), utter, pronounce; शब्द उच्चरित एव मामगात् <ls>R. 11. 73.</ls> {@--6@} (Used in the <ab>Atm.</ab>) ({%a%}) To quit, leave. ({%b%}) To sin against, be unfaithful (to a husband or wife), transgress against; धर्ममुच्चरते <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%c%}) To violate or transgress in general, stray or deviate from; <ls>Bk. 8. 31.</ls> ({%d%}) To rise up to, ascend (trans.); <ls>N. 5. 48</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 52.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to issue. {@--2@} To utter, pronounce, declare. {@--3@} To void one's excrement. {@--4@} To emit.
